1.0.1.name: wordpress/sharexy
1.0.1.description:
Sharexy.com is a social content distribution network where you can publish news, articles, reviews and your blog updates announcements and put them in front of eyes of thousands Bloggers and Readers Easy and totally Free. Click here to learn more

Sharexy plugin includes two useful tool that will help you get more free traffic to your blog and make it considerably more popular - Highly Customizable Sharing Tool and Network Buzz Monitoring Tool.

About Sharing Tool

What is the ideal sharing and bookmark widget like?

  • Easily and quickly adjusted

  • Awesome looking, with buttons design fitting your blog design

  • Enabling the choice of placement in the right places for your visitors to spot and utilize

  • Effective and attracting a
